danata prathilabhin 105 kata ru.mili. 2.745 ka naya ha aadhara laba di atha. 2016 warshaye madakalapuwa ha yapanaya kottasaye wandambau ha gruhamulika kanthawan sawibala ganwime wadasatahana aadayam uthpadana marga sandaha pelambaawime puhunu wadasatahana dilidu kanthawan athara pawathna wirakiyawa ha yapum mattama awama kirima eki kanthawan ha pawulwala aadayam mattama ihala nanwima wyaparika kshethraye kantha dayakathwaya ihala nanwima aarthika sanwardhana kriyawaliyata kanthawange sakriya dayakathwaya ihala nanwima 2016.05.19/20 dina badulla pradeshiya lekam kottasaye pawathi aadayam uthpadana marga sandaha pelambaawime puhunuwa wyawasayaka kshethrayata piwisena kantha karya sanwidhana samajikawan sandaha wyapara aarambha kirimata awashya mulika puhunuwa ha amudrawya pahasukam labadima mema wadasatahanin sidukere.
